00022 {

00030 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 UIButton::~UIButton()
00032 {
00033   if (m_hasText)
00034   {
00035     delete m_text;
00036   }
00037 }

00040 void UIButton::updateButton(ngl::Vec2 _pos, ngl::Vec2 _dimensions, ngl::Vec4 _colour)
00041 {
00042   m_buttonPos = _pos;
00043   m_buttonDimensions = _dimensions;
00044   m_buttonColour = _colour;
00045 }

00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 void UIButton::updateText(std::string _text, ngl::Vec3 _colour, ngl::Vec2 _offset)
00049 {
00050   if (m_hasText == true)
00051   {
00052     m_textString = _text;
00053     m_text->setColour(_colour.m_x, _colour.m_y, _colour.m_z);
00054     m_textOffset = _offset;
00055 
00056     m_textPos.m_x = ((m_buttonPos.m_x + 1) * m_windowDimensions.m_x) / 2;
00057     m_textPos.m_y = ((1 - m_buttonPos.m_y) * m_windowDimensions.m_y) / 2;
00058   }
00059   else
00060   {
00061     std::cout<<"Error: Text has not been initialised for this button."<<std::endl;
00062   }
00063 }
00064 
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 void UIButton::addText(std::string _font, int _fontSize)
00067 {
00068   if (m_hasText == false)
00069   {
00070     m_text = new Text(_font, _fontSize);
00071     m_hasText = true;
00072   }
00073   else
00074   {
00075     std::cout<<"Error: This button already has text."<<std::endl;
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 bool UIButton::isClicked(int _x, int _y)
00081 {
00082   ngl::Vec2 ndc;
00083   ndc.m_x = ((2.f * _x) / m_windowDimensions.m_x) - 1.f;
00084   ndc.m_y = 1.f - ((2.f * _y) / m_windowDimensions.m_y);
00085 
00086   if (ndc.m_x >= (m_buttonPos.m_x - m_buttonDimensions.m_x/2) && ndc.m_x <= (m_buttonPos.m_x + m_buttonDimensions.m_x/2) &&
00087       ndc.m_y >= (m_buttonPos.m_y - m_buttonDimensions.m_y/2) && ndc.m_y <= (m_buttonPos.m_y + m_buttonDimensions.m_y/2))
00088   {
00089     return true;
00090   }
00091   else
00092   {
00093     return false;
00094   }
00095 }

00162 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 void UIButton::draw()
00164 {
00165   loadMatricesToShader();
00166   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createTrianglePlane("button", m_buttonDimensions.m_x, m_buttonDimensions.m_y, 1, 1, ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00167   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("button");
00168   if (m_hasText == true)
00169   {
00170     m_text->renderText(m_textPos.m_x + m_textOffset.m_x, m_textPos.m_y + m_textOffset.m_y, m_textString);
00171   }
00172 }
00173 
00174 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 void UIButton::loadMatricesToShader()
00176 {
00177   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00178   (*shader)["nglColourShader"]->use();
00179   shader->setShaderParam4f("Colour", m_buttonColour.m_x, m_buttonColour.m_y,m_buttonColour.m_z, 1.f);
00180 
00181   ngl::Transformation t;
00182   t.setPosition(ngl::Vec3(m_buttonPos.m_x, m_buttonPos.m_y, 0.f));
00183   t.setRotation(90.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00184 
00185   ngl::Mat4 M;
00186   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00187   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00188   M=t.getMatrix();
00189   MV=  M*ngl::lookAt(ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 10), ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 0), ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00190   MVP= MV*ngl::ortho(-1, 1, -1, 1, 0.1f, 100.f);
00191   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00192 }
